traits.name: Skillful
traits.text: Reduces production time for  Textbooks by 10%/15%/20%/25%

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Air (破艇魚雷・空)
text:
When [Torpedo Bomber] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Kaga's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.If Akagi is in the same fleet, increases [Flooding] damage by 30%.

skills.name: Precision Bombing (精密爆撃 ·)
text: During battle, prioritizes target with the highest current HP
The higher the enemy's HP, the more [Airstrike] damage Kaga deals, up to 20%.

skills.name: First Strike Doctrine- Defensive (先攻重視 · 守)
text: In Map Mode, first [Pre-emptive Airstrike] deals 150% more damage. 100 seconds after entering a map, buff will be lost

comment: Carefree and friendly. Is good at carpentry. Although normally lighthearted, she is more motivated when things take a turn of the worse.
